column.name: internal_resource_id
column.comments: Internal identifier of the resource. Used for referential integrity.

column.name: creation_date
column.comments: Timestamp representing when the resource was created.

column.name: last_update
column.comments: Timestamp representing when the resource was last updated.

column.name: resource_version
column.comments: Unique identifier of the resource version. Used for optimistic locking.
